title: RADS error
body:
Could not connect to HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access. 

i have internet connection i was literally playing a few matches then i exited the game then try to get back on and im having this problem i tried to reinstall does not fix anything any help ?

replies.body: There's a service issue currently where some players can't login.  Players on the legacy client may seen a RADS error, while it may show as a connection notification on the updated client.  The issue seems to be intermittent and improving now.  Hang tight until services are restored!
Thanks for the reply. I'm also experiencing this issue. Coincidentally I'm experiencing it because I closed the client to try and click to register for the new client beta XD
